Articles.Content:
Pokemons get disabled and become Pokemoffs.

Upd.  

Except the last one who revenges the previous poster for pokemonohating.
<font face="Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif">I use my back up: Peeko and Liosen.</font>
I use 16 Ton Weight. It’s super effective! My hill.
Hill is mine due to 16 Ton Weight not being a valid Pokémove or Prodigy spell.
Pokemon and Prodigy do not exist in this universe. My hill.

Spoiler

Pokémon = yes

Prodigy = yes

I attack you with my Grass- and Fairy-type posse of Pokémon.

Peeko uses Leaf Wind.

Liosen uses Charclone.

Each of my Pokémon use their strongest attacks.

Ditto transforms into a teacup and pours hot tea on you.

sv\_cheats\_1

pokemon\_0

noclip\_1

I use cheats to turn off Pokemon and noclip into the hill, and kick everyone out.

Now I'm praying I don't have to take a VACation.

Never even knew [Pokemondo](http://superfounders.com/2016/07/pokemondo-the-first-romanian-startup-inspired-by-pokemon-go1/) was a real thing.

My hill.

Giant dome over you puts out your fire.

My hill
I fly a drone through the hill at 10000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000 times the speed of light. I fill in the crater. My hill.

Liosen burns up your hill. My burned clearing.

Also, [@Kernel Kraken](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/181383-kernel-kraken/) turned off Pokemon, not Pokémon so I still have my Pokémon.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-07-24T13:52:58Z" title="07/24/2018 01:52  PM" data-short="5 yr">July 24, 2018</time> by HansonKerman**

> 
> 
> 45 minutes ago, HansonKerman said:
> 
> 
> Liosen burns up your hill. My burned clearing.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Also, [@Kernel Kraken](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/181383-kernel-kraken/) turned off Pokemon, not Pokémon so I still have my Pokémon.
> 

Console commands don't require the 'é' .

They're meant to be "simple".

I change the <font face="Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif">persistent.sfs of the persistent.sfs. Still my hill.</font>

<font face="Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif">My Fairy Pokémon are guarding my hill. (no not Flabébé)</font>

I use the emperor's blade from the frackin' universe mod to tear you into green and blue bits. 

my quietus hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-07-24T16:06:57Z" title="07/24/2018 04:06  PM" data-short="5 yr">July 24, 2018</time> by Fraston**
I eat the hill. You die. I regurgitate the hill. My hill

i can't die. I'm the god of death. i run you over with the landkruezer p-1000 ratte.

my hill with massive tank track impressions.

> > > 7 hours ago, Fraston said: > > > I use the emperor's blade from the frackin' universe mod to tear you into green and blue bits. > > > > > > > > > > my quietus hill. > What is frackin' universe? > > > 2 hours ago, Fraston said: > > > i can't die. I'm the god of death. i run you over with the landkruezer p-1000 ratte. > > > > > my hill with massive tank track impressions. > Spoiler immortalUsers = 0 hillOwnership = HansonKerman I use my Fire-types to melt [@Fraston](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/188565-fraston/) (because, logically, a Glitch would be Steel-type), and guard my hill.
I am invincible and cannot die. I take the hill using thousands of BDA fighter jets. My hill.

The server with hill is restarted.

All immortals, invincibles, godlikes, and almighties were not saved. Oops, sorrie...

A default hill.
i remake myself. My hill by default.

Spoiler

immortalUsers = 0

hillOwnership = 0

Hill belo<font face="Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif">ngs to no-one</font>

**Edited <time datetime="2018-07-25T17:16:51Z" title="07/25/2018 05:16  PM" data-short="5 yr">July 25, 2018</time> by HansonKerman**
I make myself immortal again. I take the hill. My hill.

Spoiler

![76790782_w640_h640_img6582.jpg](https://images.ua.prom.st/76790782_w640_h640_img6582.jpg)

Noone's hill.
A Saturn S-IC stage hits the hill, destroying it. My destroyed hill.

<font face="Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif">I find Celebi, the Time Travel Pokémon (somehow), teleport into the future, go to <s>Mars </s>Duna, and make a hill there. MY future hill.</font>
